src:
ROBOR la 3 luni scade la cel mai redus nivel din ultimele 10 luni
01 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Dorin Oancea, Mediafax
Indicele ROBOR la 3 luni, folosit pentru calcularea dobânzilor la creditele în lei a scăzut vineri la 2,98%, de la 2,99%, la cel mai redus nivel din ultimele zece luni.
Indiciele ROBOR la 6 luni a scăzut uşor la 3,06%, de la 3,07% joi, iar cel la 9 luni a scăzut la 3,11%, de la 3,12% luni.
B2: 640x160_adtext (2016) - thinkdigital_ro.zf.ro.HiTech.640x160_adtext
ROBOR reprezintă rata medie a dobânzii la care băncile româneşti se împrumută între ele în lei, iar din anul 2010 a fost stabilit drept referinţa în funcţie de care să fie stabilite ratele creditelor.
Din acest an ROBOR a fost înlocuit de IRCC la stabilirea dobânzilor plătite la creditele acordate consumatorilor, valaorea acestui indice fiind în prezent 2,66%.
text:
ROBOR at 3 months decreases to the lowest level in the last 10 months
01 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Dorin Oancea, Mediafax
The ROBOR 3-month index, used to calculate interest rates on loans in lei, fell on Friday to 2.98%, from 2.99%, to the lowest level in the last ten months.
ROBOR indexes at 6 months fell slightly to 3.06%, from 3.07% on Thursday, and at 9 months it fell to 3.11%, from 3.12% months.
B2: 640x160_adtext (2016) - thinkdigital_en.zf.ro.HiTech.640x160_adtext
ROBOR represents the average interest rate at which the Romanian banks lend to each other in lei, and since 2010 it has been established as the reference according to which the credit rates will be established.
Since this year, ROBOR has been replaced by the IRCC in establishing the interest paid on loans granted to consumers, the value of this index being currently 2.66%.
